Most organizations are testing their unit tests with special testing tools and need to generate some reports and statistics for their managers,
Polarion delivers an importer which can handle a xUnit file output of such automated testing tools.
  • Create a new test run called "auto_Product A" and choose "xUnit Test Manual Upload" as template
  • You will get a new test run which looks nearly like other test runs we already now. Use the "Upload Results" button to upload the file manually. Usually you would create a job which will import these files automatically.
  • Use your selenium test results file  stored at   to upload your results.
  • After uploading your test report will be generated and all test cases and defects which are new will be created, Test cases which are already available will be updated.
